=== This is a shell script to install Trac with geolocation capacity ===
 '''''At this moment is in spanglish only :P''''
* ''Works well: Ubuntu 10.04 LTS''
* ''It doesn't work: Ubuntu 8.04.2 LTS'' (bzr version too old to work with Launchpad and python-pip, python-virtualenv packages are missing.
Autor: <nowiki>[[JavierRovegno]]</nowiki>

Installation of <nowiki>[[http://trac.edgewall.org/|Trac]]</nowiki> issue tracker and plugins:
* Not need to be root
* Do not need complicated configurations
* Do not require modification trac.ini

Only need the install of a minimum number of packages from Ubuntu official repositories:
<pre>
bzr subversion python-subversion python-bzr-svn
python-setuptools python-virtualenv pip apache2-utils
</pre>

Can be used without problems in parallel with Trac installation from official repository Ubuntu.

Features:
* Configuring SMTP notification with Gmail account
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/GoogleStaticMapMacro|GoogleStaticMapMacro]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/GoogleMapMacro|GoogleMapMacro]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/GanttCalendarPlugin|GanttCalendarPlugin]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/GanttChartPlugin|GanttChartPlugin]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/TracTicketStatsPlugin|TracTicketStatsPlugin]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/DateFieldPlugin|DateFieldPlugin]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://pypi.python.org/pypi/TracBzr|TracBzr]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~jrovegno/+junk/googlemapticketplugin|Google Map Ticket]]</nowiki>:
** Add ticket-custom fields: Location, Coordinates.
** Fill the coordinates if a Location is given.

=== For INSTALL: (Estimated time <2 min) ===
1. Download the Trac Geo scripts:
   <code>$ bzr branch lp:~jrovegno/+junk/trac-geo-portable</code>
1. Change the directory to trac-geo-portable
   <code>$ cd trac-geo-portable</code>
1. Install dependencies from the official repositories Ubuntu (requires root privileges)
   <code>$ sh install_trac_deb_depens.sh</code>
1. Install Trac and Trac Geo plugins on ($HOME/trac-portable)
   <code>$ sh install.sh</code>
1. Create svn and bzr on ($HOME/geo-repository) and the Trac Geo project on ($HOME/trac-geo)
   <code>$ sh make.sh</code>

Ready!
Now check your <nowiki>[[http://localhost:8000]]</nowiki>

1. To stop trac-geo
   <code>$ sh kill_tracd.sh</code>
1. To run trac-geo
   <code>$ sh run_tracd.sh</code>
=== To UNINSTALL just deleted: (Estimated time <1 min) ===

1. Delete Repository svn and bzr
   <code>$ rm -rf $HOME/geo-repository</code>
1. Delete Project trac-geo
   <code>$ rm -rf $HOME/trac-geo</code>
1. Delete trac-portable
   <code>$ rm -rf $HOME/trac-portable</code>
